description.value: As a Speaker, you've forged a deep bond with powerful spirits who you can urge to rise up to defend you and your people. If you're a Faithspeaker, you can call on gods or powerful planar beings to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Share Life] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Status], each once per day as innate divine spells; if you're a Greenspeaker, you can call on the forces of nature to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Entangling Flora] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Environmental Endurance], each once per day as innate primal spells.

value.value: budding speaker centaur heritage or Speaker in Training
